Plot: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence and future prospects.
Title: Boyz n the Hood
Actors: Hudhail Al-Amir, Lloyd Avery II, Angela Bassett, Mia Bell
tomatoConsensus: Well-acted and thematically rich, Boyz N the Hood observes urban America with far more depth and compassion than many of the like-minded films its success inspired.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 13 nominations.
